peregrine.config
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.config.BaseConfig
      peregrine.config.Config

public class Config
extends BaseConfig

Configuration settings for Peregrine. See peregrine.conf for documentation of these variables.

This also includes all settings for the runtime including the Host, Membership, as well as the HttpClientRuntime.

init

public void init()
Init this config including partition layout and any other necessary tasks.

releaseExternalResources

public void releaseExternalResources()
Release all external resources that this config depends on. The httpClientRuntime being one of them. Calling this method is required for clean shutdown.
